name: mosaic blanket
notes:
materials
- color a: 4 (6, 7) skeins of purl soho’s [worsted twist][1], 100% merino wool. each skein is 164 yards/ 100 grams; approximately 656 (984, 1148) yards required.
- color b: 6 (8, 10) skeins of purl soho’s [alpaca pure][2], 100% super baby alpaca. each skein is 109 yards/ 100 grams; approximately 654 (872, 1090) yards required. 

you will also need...

- a us 8 (5.0 mm), 24 or 32-inch [circular needle][4]

gauge
- 19 stitches and 38 rows = 4 inches in mosaic stitch, using colors a and b
- 15 stitches and 32 rows = 4 inches in garter stitch, using color a

sizes
baby (crib, throw)

approximately 26 x 35 (33½ x 40, 41 x 46½) inches

sample: we knit the baby size.


  [1]: https://www.purlsoho.com/worsted-twist.html
  [2]: https://www.purlsoho.com/alpaca-pure
  [3]: https://www.purlsoho.com/yarn.html?yarn_stitches_per_inch_filter=971
  [4]: https://www.purlsoho.com/tools/knitting-needles.html?type_filter=881
